00018         CEventListenerQueue::CEventListenerQueue()
00019                 : m_queue(new TListenerQueue)
00020         {
00021         }
00022 
00024 
00025         CEventListenerQueue::CEventListenerQueue(const CEventListenerQueue& source)
00026         {
00027                 THREAD_ANY();
00028 
00029                 // Protect source queue against simultaneous read/write access
00030                 scoped_lock l(source.m_lock);
00031 
00032                 m_queue = source.m_queue;
00033         }
00034 
00036 
00037         CEventListenerQueue::~CEventListenerQueue()
00038         {
00039                 THREAD_ANY();
00040 
00041                 // Safe - writes on different pointers (even sharing the ref count) are allowed
00042                 m_queue.reset();
00043         }
00044 
00046 
00047         void CEventListenerQueue::AddListener(IUnknown* listener)
00048         {
00049                 THREAD_ANY();
00050                 scoped_lock l(m_lock);
00051 
00052                 PreModify();
00053 
00054                 listener->AddRef();
00055                 m_queue->push_back(listener);
00056         }
00057 
00059 
00060         void CEventListenerQueue::RemoveListener(IUnknown* listener)
00061         {
00062                 THREAD_ANY();
00063                 scoped_lock l(m_lock);
00064 
00065                 PreModify();
00066 
00067                 TListenerQueue::iterator it = std::find(m_queue->begin(), m_queue->end(), listener);
00068                 ASSERT_STRICT(it != m_queue->end());
00069 
00070                 if(it != m_queue->end())
00071                 {
00072                         m_queue->erase(it);
00073                         listener->Release();
00074                 }
00075         }
00076 
00078 
00079         size_t CEventListenerQueue::Size() const
00080         {
00081                 return m_queue->size();
00082         }
00083 
00085 
00086         IUnknown** CEventListenerQueue::getListeners() const
00087         {
00088                 THREAD_ANY();
00089 
00090                 return Size() != 0 ? &(*m_queue)[0] : 0;
00091         }
00092 
00094 
00095         void CEventListenerQueue::PreModify()
00096         {
00097                 if(m_queue.unique()) return;
00098 
00099                 TListenerQueue* old = m_queue.get();
00100                 m_queue.reset(new TListenerQueue(*old));
00101         }
